sn36.17:4.1: Atha kho sambahulā bhikkhū yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkamiṃsu;
sn36.17:4.3: Ekamantaṃ nisinnā kho te bhikkhū bhagavantaṃ etadavocuṃ:
sn36.17:4.4: “katamā nu kho, bhante, vedanā, katamo vedanāsamudayo, katamo vedanānirodho, katamā vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā?
sn36.17:4.5: Ko vedanāya assādo, ko ādīnavo, kiṃ nissaraṇan”ti?
sn36.17:4.7: sukhā vedanā, dukkhā vedanā, adukkhamasukhā vedanā—
sn36.17:4.11: Ayameva ariyo aṭṭhaṅgiko maggo vedanānirodhagāminī paṭipadā, seyyathidaṃ—
sn36.17:4.14: Yaṃ vedanaṃ paṭicca uppajjati sukhaṃ somanassaṃ, ayaṃ vedanāya assādo.
sn36.17:4.15: Yaṃ vedanā aniccā dukkhā vipariṇāmadhammā, ayaṃ vedanāya ādīnavo.
sn36.17:4.16: Yo vedanāya chandarāgavinayo chandarāgappahānaṃ, idaṃ vedanāya nissaraṇaṃ.
sn36.17:5.1: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ nirodho akkhāto.
sn36.17:5.2: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hoti … pe …
sn36.17:5.3: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo niruddho hoti, doso niruddho hoti, moho niruddho hoti.
sn36.17:5.4: Atha kho pana, bhikkhave, mayā anupubbasaṅkhārānaṃ vūpasamo akkhāto.
sn36.17:5.5: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā vūpasantā hoti … pe …
sn36.17:5.6: khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo vūpasanto hoti, doso vūpasanto hoti, moho vūpasanto hoti.
sn36.17:5.8: Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:5.9: Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:5.10: Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti paṭippassaddhā hoti.
sn36.17:5.11: Catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:5.12: Saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca paṭippassaddhā honti.
sn36.17:5.13: Khīṇāsavassa bhikkhuno rāgo paṭippassaddho hoti, doso paṭippassaddho hoti, moho paṭippassaddho hotī”ti.
